type.name: identification_item
type.description: This select is a place holder for assignments of identification information to elements of product data.

type.name: identification_organisation_or_person_in_organisation_item
type.description: This select extends the assignments of an organization or a person in an organization to Identification_assignments.

entity.name: Identification_assignment
entity.description: An Identification_assignment assigns an identifier which is unique for the domain of the owner (when known) to product data.

explicit.name: identifier
explicit.description: the identification string to be assigned to product data.

explicit.name: role
explicit.description: the function served by the identification.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: a textual meaning for the identification assignment.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: the product data to which the identifier is assigned.

inverse.name: owner
inverse.description: the optional organization or person in organization that defines or owns the identification.

where.label: WR1
where.description: The owner role shall be 'identification owner'
